mapper.select: SELECT SUM(in_class_number) AS sum_in ,SUM(new_student) AS sum_new FROM class_data where ( datediff ( updatetime , #{dateTime} ) = 0 )

select id,adress,new_student as newStudent,in_class_number as inClassNumber,jump_out as jumpOut,class_now_number as classNowNumber,hour_class_number as hourClassNumber,hour_in_class_number as hourInClassNumber,updatetime,hours from class_data where adress = #{address} and ( datediff ( updatetime , #{dateTime} ) = 0 ) order by updatetime desc
select hour_class_number,hours from class_data where adress = #{address} and ( datediff ( updatetime , #{dateTime} ) = 0 ) order by updatetime desc
select hour_in_class_number,hours from class_data where adress = #{address} and ( datediff ( updatetime , #{dateTime} ) = 0 ) order by updatetime desc
select count(*) from class_data where updatetime>=(NOW() - interval 1 hour)
select count(*) from class_data where adress = #{address} and updatetime>=(NOW() - interval 1 hour)
mapper.update: UPDATE class_data SET updatetime = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, hours = #{hours} WHERE id in (select id from (select * from class_data ORDER BY updatetime desc LIMIT #{num})as t)

UPDATE class_data SET new_student = new_student+#{newStudent},in_class_number =in_class_number+#{inClassNumber},hour_in_class_number = hour_in_class_number+#{hourInClassNumber} WHERE id in (select id from (select * from class_data where adress=#{address} ORDER BY updatetime desc LIMIT 1)as t)
mapper.select: select hour_in_class_number from class_data where id in (select id from (select * from class_data where adress=#{address} ORDER BY updatetime desc LIMIT 1)as t)
mapper.update: UPDATE class_data SET class_now_number = #{dynamic_customer},jump_out = jump_out+#{jumpOut_customer},hour_class_number = #{subHour_customer} WHERE id in (select id from (select * from class_data where adress=#{address} ORDER BY updatetime desc LIMIT 1)as t)
UPDATE class_data SET jump_out =jump_out+1 WHERE id in (select id from (select * from class_data where adress=#{address} ORDER BY updatetime desc LIMIT 1)as t)
mapper.delete: delete from class_data where updatetime < DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 3 MONTH)
mapper.sql: id, adress, new_student, in_class_number, jump_out, class_now_number, hour_class_number, hour_in_class_number, updatetime, hours
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from class_data
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
insert into class_data
adress,
new_student,
in_class_number,
jump_out,
class_now_number,
hour_class_number,
hour_in_class_number,
updatetime,
hours,

update class_data
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
adress = #{record.adress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
new_student = #{record.newStudent,jdbcType=INTEGER},
in_class_number = #{record.inClassNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
jump_out = #{record.jumpOut,jdbcType=INTEGER},
class_now_number = #{record.classNowNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
hour_class_number = #{record.hourClassNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
hour_in_class_number = #{record.hourInClassNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
updatetime = #{record.updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
hours = #{record.hours,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update class_data set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, adress = #{record.adress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, new_student = #{record.newStudent,jdbcType=INTEGER}, in_class_number = #{record.inClassNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, jump_out = #{record.jumpOut,jdbcType=INTEGER}, class_now_number = #{record.classNowNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, hour_class_number = #{record.hourClassNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, hour_in_class_number = #{record.hourInClassNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, updatetime = #{record.updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, hours = #{record.hours,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update class_data
adress = #{adress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
new_student = #{newStudent,jdbcType=INTEGER},
in_class_number = #{inClassNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
jump_out = #{jumpOut,jdbcType=INTEGER},
class_now_number = #{classNowNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
hour_class_number = #{hourClassNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
hour_in_class_number = #{hourInClassNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
hours = #{hours,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update class_data set adress = #{adress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, new_student = #{newStudent,jdbcType=INTEGER}, in_class_number = #{inClassNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, jump_out = #{jumpOut,jdbcType=INTEGER}, class_now_number = #{classNowNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, hour_class_number = #{hourClassNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, hour_in_class_number = #{hourInClassNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, hours = #{hours,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
